FlairAds presents Magnum - A Minimal New Tab Google extension.

It's easy to give your Chrome New Tab window a new look with Magnum. By installing this extension, you can replace your current New Tab window with a sleek interface featuring unlimited exotic wallpapers.

By clicking "Add to Chrome," I accept the installation of the Magnum extension and set Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing, as described in the Terms of Use(https://www.flairads.com/terms-and-conditions/) and Privacy Policy(https://www.flairads.com/privacy-policy/).
